text: Nitori yiye ti won funra won ye adehun won ni A fi sebi le won. A si mu okan won le koko (nitori pe) won n gbe awon oro kuro ni awon aye re, won si gbagbe ipin kan ninu oore ti A fi se iranti fun won. O o nii ye ri onijanba laaarin won afi die ninu won. Nitori naa, se amojukuro fun won, ki o si fori jin won. Dajudaju Allahu feran awon oluse-rere
